sentences.en: He also told me that your attendances at his tutorial and seminar have been poor .
sentences.cn: 他还告诉我说你的辅导课和讨论课出勤率不高。

sentences.en: Lu Yin is the first female writer to join literary study seminar.
sentences.cn: 摘要庐隐是最早参加文学研究会的女作家.

sentences.en: Publishers and writers from 13 countries attended the seminar .
sentences.cn: 来自13个国家的出版商和作家参加了此次研讨会。

sentences.en: Seminar director Ceng Yuzhuang is attended and chaired the meeting.
sentences.cn: 研究会理事长曾毓庄出席并主持了会议.

sentences.en: Seminar topics are chosen for their accessibility to a general audience.
sentences.cn: 研讨会内容是以普通听众容易理解为依据作出选择的。

sentences.en: Students are asked to prepare material in advance of each weekly seminar.
sentences.cn: 学生要在上每星期的研讨课前备好材料。

sentences.en: The fee includes seminar materials, certificate of attendance , refreshment and lunch.
sentences.cn: 费用包括研讨会资料 、 证书 、 茶歇及午餐.

sentences.en: The fee includes seminar materials, certificate of attendance and refreshment.
sentences.cn: 费用包括研讨会资料 、 证书、茶歇.

sentences.en: The seminar aims to provide an overview on new media publishing.
sentences.cn: 研讨会旨在综览新兴的媒体出版.

sentences.en: The seminar was to discuss diversification of agriculture.
sentences.cn: 该研讨会讨论的是农业多种经营。

sentences.en: This was a novel idea to the seminar members, and it created a considerable stir.
sentences.cn: 对于研究会的会员们,这种想法很新奇, 而且这种看法也造成很大的混乱.

sentences.en: This worksheet provides space for planning your Rotary Foundation seminar.
sentences.cn: 此一工作表提供空间让你规划扶轮基金研讨会.

sentences.en: What responsibilities will you assign to the Seminar Committee?
sentences.cn: 将什麽责任分配给地区扶轮基金研讨会委员会?

sentences.en: When speaking to the seminar Mr Franklin spoke of his experience, gained on a recent visit to Trinidad.
sentences.cn: 在研讨会上发言的时候，富兰克林先生谈到了他最近游览特立尼达的经历。

sentences.en: While it will be fun, the seminar also promises to be most instructive.
sentences.cn: 这次的研讨会不仅会有趣，而且有可能会颇具启发意义。

sentences.en: Who is this guy? I know I shall not have taken this seminar.
sentences.cn: 那家伙是谁? 早知道我就不参加这个研讨会了!

trans.tran_en: a class at a university or college for a small group of students and a teacher to study or discuss a particular subject
